sources.name: EmployeeInfoCSV
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  EmployeeInfoCSV

sources.name: EmployeeSalaryCSV
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  EmployeeSalaryCSV

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared EmployeeInfoCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://nnarateststore.blob.core.windows.net/empstore/EmployeeInfo.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv])
in
  Csv;
shared EmployeeSalaryCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://nnarateststore.blob.core.windows.net/empstore/EmployeeSalary.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv])
in
  Csv;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = EmployeeInfoCSV
in
  Source;
